description:
AuctionHouse._auctionEnded(uint256) (contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#205-209) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- $.auctions[auctionId].endTime < block.timestamp (contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#208)
markdown:
[AuctionHouse._auctionEnded(uint256)](contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#L205-L209) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [$.auctions[auctionId].endTime < block.timestamp](contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#L208)

description:
AuctionHouse._requireValidEndTime(uint256) (contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#217-221) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- endTime <= block.timestamp (contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#218)
markdown:
[AuctionHouse._requireValidEndTime(uint256)](contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#L217-L221) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [endTime <= block.timestamp](contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#L218)

description:
EIP712._requireValidSignature(address,bytes32,uint256,bytes) (contracts/utils/EIP712.sol#30-46) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- deadline < block.timestamp (contracts/utils/EIP712.sol#36)
markdown:
[EIP712._requireValidSignature(address,bytes32,uint256,bytes)](contracts/utils/EIP712.sol#L30-L46) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [deadline < block.timestamp](contracts/utils/EIP712.sol#L36)
